verses.verse: נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֣ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּ֗א <S%H4430><s%> the king עֲבַד֙ <S%H5648><s%> made צְלֵ֣ם <S%H6755><s%> an image דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch דְהַ֔ב <S%H1722><s%> of gold רוּמֵהּ֙ <S%H7314><s%> whose height אַמִּ֣ין <S%H521><s%> cubits שִׁתִּ֔ין <S%H8361><s%> [was] threescore פְּתָיֵ֖הּ <S%H6613><s%> [and] the breadth אַמִּ֣ין <S%H521><s%> cubits שִׁ֑ת <S%H8353><s%> thereof six אֲקִימֵהּ֙ <S%H6966><s%> he set it up בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <S%H1236><s%> in the plain דּוּרָ֔א <S%H1757><s%> of Dura בִּמְדִינַ֖ת <S%H4083><s%> in the province בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H895><s%> of Babylon

וּנְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֣ר <S%H5020><s%> Then Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּ֡א <S%H4430><s%> the king שְׁלַ֡ח <S%H7972><s%> sent לְמִכְנַ֣שׁ ׀ <S%H3673><s%> to gather together לַֽאֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנַיָּ֡א <S%H324><s%> the princes סִגְנַיָּ֣א <S%H5460><s%> the governors וּֽפַחֲוָתָ֡א <S%H6347><s%> and the captains אֲדַרְגָּזְרַיָּא֩ <S%H148><s%> the judges גְדָ֨בְרַיָּ֤א <S%H1411><s%> the treasurers דְּתָבְרַיָּא֙ <S%H1884><s%> the counsellors תִּפְתָּיֵ֔א <S%H8614><s%> the sheriffs וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> and all שִׁלְטֹנֵ֣י <S%H7984><s%> the rulers מְדִֽינָתָ֑א <S%H4083><s%> of the provinces לְמֵתֵא֙ <S%H858><s%> to come לַחֲנֻכַּ֣ת <S%H2597><s%> to the dedication צַלְמָ֔א <S%H6755><s%> of the image דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch הֲקֵ֖ים <S%H6966><s%> had set up נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <S%H5020><s%> which Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king

בֵּאדַ֡יִן <S%H116><s%> Then מִֽתְכַּנְּשִׁ֡ין <S%H3673><s%> were gathered together אֲחַשְׁדַּרְפְּנַיָּ֡א <S%H324><s%> the princes סִגְנַיָּ֣א <S%H5460><s%> the governors וּֽפַחֲוָתָ֡א <S%H6347><s%> and captains אֲדַרְגָּזְרַיָּ֣א <S%H148><s%> the judges גְדָבְרַיָּא֩ <S%H1411><s%> the treasurers דְּתָ֨בְרַיָּ֜א <S%H1884><s%> the counsellors תִּפְתָּיֵ֗א <S%H8614><s%> the sheriffs וְכֹל֙ <S%H3606><s%> and all שִׁלְטֹנֵ֣י <S%H7984><s%> the rulers מְדִֽינָתָ֔א <S%H4083><s%> of the provinces לַחֲנֻכַּ֣ת <S%H2597><s%> unto the dedication צַלְמָ֔א <S%H6755><s%> of the image דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch הֲקֵ֖ים <S%H6966><s%> had set up נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֣ר <S%H5020><s%> that Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> the king [וְקָאֲמִין כ] (וְקָֽיְמִין֙ <S%H6966><s%> stood ק) לָקֳבֵ֣ל <S%H6903><s%> before צַלְמָ֔א <S%H6755><s%> the image דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> and they הֲקֵ֖ים <S%H6966><s%> and they stood נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּֽר׃ <S%H5020><s%> that Nebuchadnezzar

וְכָרוֹזָ֖א <S%H3744><s%> Then an herald קָרֵ֣א <S%H7123><s%> cried בְחָ֑יִל <S%H2429><s%> aloud לְכ֤וֹן אָֽמְרִין֙ <S%H560><s%> To you it is commanded עַֽמְמַיָּ֔א <S%H5972><s%> O people אֻמַּיָּ֖א <S%H524><s%> nations וְלִשָּׁנַיָּֽא׃ <S%H3961><s%> and languages

בְּעִדָּנָ֡א <S%H5732><s%> [That] at what time דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch תִשְׁמְע֡וּן <S%H8086><s%> ye hear קָ֣ל <S%H7032><s%> the sound קַרְנָ֣א <S%H7162><s%> of the cornet מַ֠שְׁרוֹקִיתָא <S%H4953><s%> flute [קִיתָרֹוס כ] (קַתְרֹ֨וס <S%H7030><s%> harp ק) סַבְּכָ֤א <S%H5443><s%> sackbut פְּסַנְתֵּרִין֙ <S%H6460><s%> psaltery סוּמְפֹּ֣נְיָ֔ה <S%H5481><s%> dulcimer וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> and all זְנֵ֣י <S%H2178><s%> kinds זְמָרָ֑א <S%H2170><s%> of musick תִּפְּל֤וּן <S%H5308><s%> ye fall down וְתִסְגְּדוּן֙ <S%H5457><s%> and worship לְצֶ֣לֶם <S%H6755><s%> image דַּהֲבָ֔א <S%H1722><s%> the golden דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch הֲקֵ֖ים <S%H6966><s%> hath set up נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <S%H5020><s%> that Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king וּמַן־ <S%H4479><s%> what דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch

לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> not יִפֵּ֖ל <S%H5308><s%> down וְיִסְגֻּ֑ד <S%H5457><s%> and worshippeth בַּהּ־ שַׁעֲתָ֣א <S%H8160><s%> shall the same hour יִתְרְמֵ֔א <S%H7412><s%> be cast לְגֽוֹא־ <S%H1459><s%> into the midst אַתּ֥וּן <S%H861><s%> furnace נוּרָ֖א <S%H5135><s%> fiery יָקִֽדְתָּֽא׃ <S%H3345><s%> of a burning

כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all קֳבֵ֣ל <S%H6903><s%> according to דְּנָ֡ה <S%H1836><s%> time בֵּהּ־ זִמְנָ֡א <S%H2166><s%> at that time כְּדִ֣י <S%H1768><s%> when שָֽׁמְעִ֣ין <S%H8086><s%> heard כָּֽל־ <S%H3606><s%> and all עַמְמַיָּ֡א <S%H5972><s%> the people קָ֣ל <S%H7032><s%> the sound קַרְנָא֩ <S%H7162><s%> of the cornet מַשְׁר֨וֹקִיתָ֜א <S%H4953><s%> flute [קִיתָרֹס כ] (קַתְרֹ֤וס <S%H7030><s%> harp ק) שַׂבְּכָא֙ <S%H5443><s%> sackbut פְּסַנְטֵרִ֔ין <S%H6460><s%> psaltery וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> all זְנֵ֣י <S%H2178><s%> kinds זְמָרָ֑א <S%H2170><s%> of musick נָֽפְלִ֨ין <S%H5308><s%> fell down כָּֽל־ <S%H3606><s%> and all עַֽמְמַיָּ֜א <S%H5972><s%> the people אֻמַיָּ֣א <S%H524><s%> the nations וְלִשָּׁנַיָּ֗א <S%H3961><s%> and the languages סָֽגְדִין֙ <S%H5457><s%> [and] worshipped לְצֶ֣לֶם <S%H6755><s%> image דַּהֲבָ֔א <S%H1722><s%> the golden דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> when הֲקֵ֖ים <S%H6966><s%> had set up נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <S%H5020><s%> that Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king

כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all קֳבֵ֤ל <S%H6903><s%> For דְּנָה֙ <S%H1836><s%> at that בֵּהּ־ זִמְנָ֔א <S%H2166><s%> time קְרִ֖בוּ <S%H7127><s%> came near גֻּבְרִ֣ין <S%H1400><s%> certain כַּשְׂדָּאִ֑ין <S%H3779><s%> Chaldeans וַאֲכַ֥לוּ <S%H399><s%> and brought קַרְצֵיה֖וֹן <S%H7170><s%> charges דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> against יְהוּדָיֵֽא׃ <S%H3062><s%> the Jews

עֲנוֹ֙ <S%H6032><s%> They spake וְאָ֣מְרִ֔ין <S%H560><s%> and said לִנְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֖ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> to the king מַלְכָּ֖א <S%H4430><s%> O king לְעָלְמִ֥ין <S%H5957><s%> for ever חֱיִֽי׃ <S%H2418><s%> live

[אַנְתָּה כ] (אַ֣נְתְּ <S%H607><s%> as for thee ק) מַלְכָּא֮ <S%H4430><s%> O king שָׂ֣מְתָּ <S%H7761><s%> hast made טְּעֵם֒ <S%H2942><s%> a decree דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> who כָל־ <S%H3606><s%> that every אֱנָ֡שׁ <S%H606><s%> man דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> who יִשְׁמַ֡ע <S%H8086><s%> that shall hear קָ֣ל <S%H7032><s%> the sound קַרְנָ֣א <S%H7162><s%> of the cornet מַ֠שְׁרֹקִיתָא <S%H4953><s%> flute [קִיתָרֹס כ] (קַתְרֹ֨וס <S%H7030><s%> harp ק) שַׂבְּכָ֤א <S%H5443><s%> sackbut פְסַנְתֵּרִין֙ <S%H6460><s%> psaltery [וְסִיפֹּנְיָה כ] (וְסוּפֹּ֣נְיָ֔ה <S%H5481><s%> bagpipe ק) וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> and all זְנֵ֣י <S%H2178><s%> kinds זְמָרָ֑א <S%H2170><s%> of musick יִפֵּ֥ל <S%H5308><s%> shall fall down וְיִסְגֻּ֖ד <S%H5457><s%> and worship לְצֶ֥לֶם <S%H6755><s%> image דַּהֲבָֽא׃ <S%H1722><s%> the golden וּמַן־ <S%H4479><s%> what דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> who

לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> not יִפֵּ֖ל <S%H5308><s%> down וְיִסְגֻּ֑ד <S%H5457><s%> and worshippeth יִתְרְמֵ֕א <S%H7412><s%> [that] he should be cast לְגֽוֹא־ <S%H1459><s%> into the midst אַתּ֥וּן <S%H861><s%> furnace נוּרָ֖א <S%H5135><s%> fiery יָקִֽדְתָּֽא׃ <S%H3345><s%> of a burning

אִיתַ֞י <S%H383><s%> There are גֻּבְרִ֣ין <S%H1400><s%> certain יְהוּדָאיִ֗ן <S%H3062><s%> Jews דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> whom מַנִּ֤יתָ <S%H4483><s%> thou hast set יָתְהוֹן֙ <S%H3487><s%> whom עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> over עֲבִידַת֙ <S%H5673><s%> the affairs מְדִינַ֣ת <S%H4083><s%> of the province בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H895><s%> of Babylon שַׁדְרַ֥ךְ <S%H7715><s%> Shadrach מֵישַׁ֖ךְ <S%H4336><s%> Meshach וַעֲבֵ֣ד נְג֑וֹ <S%H5665><s%> and Abednego גֻּבְרַיָּ֣א <S%H1400><s%> men אִלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H479><s%> these לָא־ <S%H3809><s%> not שָׂ֨מֽוּ <S%H7761><s%> have [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֤ךְ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> O king טְעֵ֔ם <S%H2942><s%> regarded [לֵאלָהַיִךְ כ] (לֵֽאלָהָךְ֙ <S%H426><s%> God ק) לָ֣א <S%H3809><s%> not פָלְחִ֔ין <S%H6399><s%> they serve וּלְצֶ֧לֶם <S%H6755><s%> image דַּהֲבָ֛א <S%H1722><s%> the golden דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> which הֲקֵ֖ימְתָּ <S%H6966><s%> which thou hast set up לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> nor סָגְדִֽין׃ <S%H5457><s%> worship ס

בֵּאדַ֤יִן <S%H116><s%> Then נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּר֙ <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar בִּרְגַ֣ז <S%H7266><s%> in [his] rage וַחֲמָ֔ה <S%H2528><s%> and fury אֲמַר֙ <S%H560><s%> commanded לְהַיְתָיָ֔ה <S%H858><s%> to bring לְשַׁדְרַ֥ךְ <S%H7715><s%> Shadrach מֵישַׁ֖ךְ <S%H4336><s%> Meshach וַעֲבֵ֣ד נְג֑וֹ <S%H5665><s%> and Abednego בֵּאדַ֙יִן֙ <S%H116><s%> Then גֻּבְרַיָּ֣א <S%H1400><s%> men אִלֵּ֔ךְ <S%H479><s%> these הֵיתָ֖יוּ <S%H858><s%> they brought קֳדָ֥ם <S%H6925><s%> before מַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king

עָנֵ֤ה <S%H6032><s%> spake נְבֻֽכַדְנֶצַּר֙ <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar וְאָמַ֣ר <S%H560><s%> and said לְה֔וֹן הַצְדָּ֕א <S%H6656><s%> unto them [Is it] true שַׁדְרַ֥ךְ <S%H7715><s%> O Shadrach מֵישַׁ֖ךְ <S%H4336><s%> Meshach וַעֲבֵ֣ד נְג֑וֹ <S%H5665><s%> and Abednego לֵֽאלָהַ֗י <S%H426><s%> my gods לָ֤א <S%H3809><s%> do not אִֽיתֵיכוֹן֙ <S%H383><s%> ye פָּֽלְחִ֔ין <S%H6399><s%> serve וּלְצֶ֧לֶם <S%H6755><s%> image דַּהֲבָ֛א <S%H1722><s%> the golden דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch הֲקֵ֖ימֶת <S%H6966><s%> which I have set לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> nor סָֽגְדִֽין׃ <S%H5457><s%> worship

כְּעַ֞ן <S%H3705><s%> Now הֵ֧ן <S%H2006><s%> if אִֽיתֵיכ֣וֹן <S%H383><s%> ye be עֲתִידִ֗ין <S%H6263><s%> ready דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> who בְעִדָּנָ֡א <S%H5732><s%> that at what time דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> who תִשְׁמְע֡וּן <S%H8086><s%> ye hear קָ֣ל <S%H7032><s%> the sound קַרְנָ֣א <S%H7162><s%> of the cornet מַשְׁרוֹקִיתָ֣א <S%H4953><s%> flute [קִיתָרֹס כ] (קַתְרֹ֣וס <S%H7030><s%> harp ק) שַׂבְּכָ֡א <S%H5443><s%> sackbut פְּסַנְתֵּרִין֩ <S%H6460><s%> psaltery וְסוּמְפֹּ֨נְיָ֜ה <S%H5481><s%> and dulcimer וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3606><s%> and all זְנֵ֣י <S%H2178><s%> kinds זְמָרָ֗א <S%H2170><s%> of musick תִּפְּל֣וּן <S%H5308><s%> ye fall down וְתִסְגְּדוּן֮ <S%H5457><s%> and worship לְצַלְמָ֣א <S%H6755><s%> the image דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> who עַבְדֵת֒ <S%H5648><s%> which I have made וְהֵן֙ <S%H2006><s%> [well] but if לָ֣א <S%H3809><s%> not תִסְגְּד֔וּן <S%H5457><s%> ye worship בַּהּ־ שַׁעֲתָ֣ה <S%H8160><s%> the same hour תִתְרְמ֔וֹן <S%H7412><s%> ye shall be cast לְגֽוֹא־ <S%H1459><s%> into the midst אַתּ֥וּן <S%H861><s%> furnace נוּרָ֖א <S%H5135><s%> fiery יָקִֽדְתָּ֑א <S%H3345><s%> of a burning וּמַן־ <S%H4479><s%> and who ה֣וּא <S%H1932><s%> it אֱלָ֔הּ <S%H426><s%> [is] that God דֵּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> who יְשֵֽׁיזְבִנְכ֖וֹן <S%H7804><s%> that shall deliver מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> you out of יְדָֽי׃ <S%H3028><s%> hand
